title: SSERC Graphics CD-ROM (1993) (RISC OS)
description:

        |   Supplied......:  Acorn Antiques    Release name..:  SSERC.rar      |
        |   Packaged......:  filth             Release type..:  Util           |

        |                                                                      |
        |   ================================================================   |
        |                            Description                               |
        |   ================================================================   |
        |                                                                      |
        |   After a long, long, long summer holiday... we're back! Look for    |
        |   more releases coming soon! And now, onto tonight's feature:        |
        |                                                                      |
        |   ================================================================   |
        |                                                                      |
        |   SSERC Graphics CD ROM                                              | 
        |                                                                      |
        |   SSERC, the Scottish Schools Equipment Research Centre, has         |
        |   combined its collection of science and technology graphics from    |
        |   15 floppy discs onto one CD. This has enabled the graphics         |
        |   collection to be offered in all of the formats which were          |
        |   previously only available as options: Draw, text-to-path, sprite,  |
        |   and DXF. The graphics are also provided in Vector libraries for    |
        |   use with the 4Mation application, Vector. In addition, the CD      |
        |   contains composites of circuits and experimental set-ups, a range  |
        |   of BASIC programs and utility applications, sample logged data,    |
        |   and collections of molecular models produced by the SSERC Chemical |
        |   Modeller package.                                                  |
        |                                                                      |
        |   Categories include:                                                |
        |                                                                      |
        |    - art                                                             |
        |    - biology                                                         |
        |    - chemistry                                                       |
        |    - circuit boards                                                  |
        |    - computing                                                       |
        |    - draw guides                                                     |
        |    - DXF                                                             |
        |    - electronics                                                     |
        |    - interfaces                                                      |
        |    - molecules                                                       |
        |    - physics                                                         |
        |    - safety signs                                                    |
        |    - sensors                                                         |
        |    - technology                                                      |
        |    - weather                                                         |
        |    - vectors                                                         |
        |    - sprites                                                         |
        |    - converters                                                      |
        |    - utilities                                                       |
        |    - miscellany                                                      |
        |                                                                      |
